description: The right tools can make all the difference, and for today's learners, Intel-powered AI PCs are proving to be that essential upgrade.
title: From Homework to Hackathons: How Intel's AI-Powered PCs Are Helping Kids Lead Smarter

description: Google is reportedly testing a new Live Translate feature within Circle to Search. Though not active yet, it was spotted in the app drawer alongside screen translation and song recognition. When enabled, it lets users choose translation for the whole screen or specific apps. The tool reportedly launches with a rainbow edge animation and offers a movable floating overlay to set language, minimise, or crop text, though the crop tool isn’t working yet. Currently, dynamic translations appear only briefly, limiting proper testing.
title: Google's Circle to Search Feature Could Get Real-Time 'Live Translate' Feature: Report

description: Apple's standard iPhone 17 model has reportedly entered the mass production phase. The upcoming Apple handset is allegedly being manufactured at Foxconn’s Bengaluru facility, which is its second-largest unit outside of China. The Taiwan-based contract manufacturer is said to be manufacturing the phone at its Bengaluru and Chennai facilities simultaneously.
title: iPhone 17 Production Reportedly Begins in India At Foxconn’s Bengaluru Facility

description: August will see several major game releases, including a host of remasters and remakes and new titles for the Nintendo Switch 2. Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater releases on August 28 across PC, PS5, and Xbox Series S/X, while Gears of War: Reloaded hits PC and consoles on August 26.
title: Metal Gear Solid Delta, Gears of War: Reloaded, Mafia: The Old Country: The Biggest Games in August

description: Realme P4 5G is all set to go official on August 20. Days ahead of the formal reveal, Realme has announced the India pricing and key specifications of the upcoming P series smartphone. It is advertised to be the only smartphone sub-Rs. 20,000 segment to have a dedicated graphics chip.
title: Realme P4 5G Price in India Revealed Ahead of August 20 Launch Date

description: Google Photos appears to be testing a new feature that lets users delete or keep an image by swiping right or left on it. Several netizens claimed to have spotted this unnamed feature on Saturday. The feature is said to only appear when the app is opened, and in most cases, it vanishes after the first use.
title: Google Photos Said to Be Testing a Tinder-Style Swipe-Based Photo Deletion Feature

description: Google could launch a few accessories alongside its Pixel 10 series phones. Ahead of the official launch, retail websites have allegedly listed them online, revealing the price details. The listing allegedly shows the 67W adapter, Pixelsnap stand, and Pixel 10 series cases.
title: Google Pixel 10 Series Accessories Including 67W Power Adapter Reportedly Listed on Retailer Sites

description: Honor X7c 5G has been launched in India. The smartphone is powered by a Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 chipset, paired with 8GB of RAM and 256GB of internal storage. The phone runs on Android 14-based MagicOS 8.0. It features a dual rear camera setup, with a 50-megapixel primary lens and a 2-megapixel depth sensor. The phone will go on sale on August 20 and will be available exclusively on Amazon.
title: Honor X7c 5G With Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 SoC, 5,200mAh Battery Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: OpenAI updated the GPT-5 artificial intelligence (AI) model on Saturday to make its responses “warmer and friendlier.” The San Francisco-based AI firm highlighted that it has tweaked the model so that it would not appear cold or rude to users. The updated version of the large language model (LLM) is currently being rolled out to all users globally.
title: OpenAI Says GPT-5 Is Now ‘Warmer and Friendlier’ After Users Complained About Cold Treatment

description: Vivo Y500 is confirmed to launch in China soon. The smartphone brand however, has not revealed the exact launch date of the phone. It is expected to offer a durable build and a long-lasting battery. The Vivo Y500 is likely to come with upgrades over the Vivo Y300 and Vivo Y400 5G.
title: Vivo Y500 China Launch, Design Teased Days After Company Unveils Vivo Y400 in India

description: Xiaomi Smart Home Screen Max 27 has a 27-inch anti-glare touch screen with 1,920×1,080 resolution. Its stand is rotatable, height-adjustable, and comes with hidden wheels. The device runs on an octa core processor with 6GB RAM and 128GB storage. It uses HyperOS and Super XiaoAI for smart home control and offers pet-themed screensavers. It supports music, karaoke, fitness, video streaming, and can work as an extra PC display.
title: Xiaomi Smart Home Screen Max 27 Launched With 9,700mAh Battery, 5-Megapixel Camera

description: Airtel is currently experiencing a network outage, as reported by users across India. Over the past 30 minutes, users have taken to social media and Downdetector to voice their complaints. The issues reported include the inability to make calls, send messages, or access mobile internet services, with some devices showing "no signal."
title: Airtel Down? Telecom Operator Responds as Thousands of Users Report Issues Making Calls, Sending Messages

description: BSNL launched its e-SIM service in Tamil Nadu on Friday. According to the state-owned telecom operator, the e-SIM service is a flexible and cost-effective solution that eliminates the need to obtain physical SIM cards for a BSNL connection. While it is currently available in a single region, the e-SIM service will soon be expanded across the country, enabling customers to take advantage of facilities like instant activation and Internet of Things (IoT)-ready connectivity.
title: BSNL Launches e-SIM Service in Tamil Nadu Circle; Pan-India Expansion to Follow Soon

description: Grok Imagine, xAI’s latest multimodal artificial intelligence (AI) tool, is now available to all users globally without any cost. Last week, xAI Founder Elon Musk announced that for a limited period, the AI images and videos generating tool is now available to all users, irrespective of whether they have a paid subscription or not. The tool, which was introduced earlier this month, offers text-to-image and image-to-video modalities.
title: Grok Imagine Is Now Free for All Users Globally, Elon Musk Announces: How to Use It

description: Apple is expected to unveil its latest smartphone lineup, the iPhone 17-series, in September. However, the company is also expected to launch a more affordable phone in its lineup in May next year, which could succeed the iPhone 16e. Ahead of its anticipated launch, the specifications of the smartphone have surfaced online. Additionally, the Cupertino company will reportedly not launch the standard iPhone 18 model in September 2026.
title: iPhone 17e Specifications Tipped; Apple Might Not Launch the Standard iPhone 18 in 2026

description: Samsung Galaxy Tab Active 5 Enterprise Edition has launched in India, priced at Rs. 49,999 for the 6GB + 128GB variant and Rs. 56,999 for the 8GB + 256GB model. The rugged tablet features MIL-STD-810H durability, IP68 dust and water resistance, Gorilla Glass 5 display protection, and a user-replaceable 5,050mAh battery with No-Battery Mode. It includes a customisable Active Key with Push-to-Talk support and ships with an IP68-rated S Pen. Business buyers also receive Brity Works, Zello, Google Workspace features, and a complimentary Knox Suite plan.
title: Samsung Galaxy Tab Active 5 Enterprise Edition Launched in India With User-Replaceable 5,050mAh Battery

description: Gamescom Opening Night Live showcase will be livestreamed on Tuesday. The show will feature new game announcements, updates and trailers, gameplay reveals, and more. Here's what to expect from the show.
title: Gamescom Opening Night Live What to Expect: Black Ops 7, Ghost of Yotei, Silent Hill f and More

description: Apple might soon suffer from a senior management problem. As per a report, the Cupertino-based tech giant could see a senior executive depart from their position next year. This reported departure will come after Apple’s former Chief Financial Officer, Luca Maestri and former Chief Operating Officer Jeff Williams both announced their retirement within the previous 12 months.
title: Apple to Reportedly Witness More Senior Executives Exit Amid Ongoing Succession Changes

description: Asus ROG Xbox Ally has been spotted on Amazon ahead of its launch. The launch date of the upcoming ROG Xbox Ally is expected to be announced during Gamescom 2025, which will begin in August. This comes after the price of the devices in Europe leaked. The company first unveiled the two handhelds, the ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X, on June 8.
title: Asus ROG Xbox Ally Briefly Listed on Amazon Ahead of Imminent Launch Date Announcement

description: Bharat Sanchar Nigam Limited (BSNL) announced the launch of its 4G services in Delhi. The soft launch was launched last week on the occasion of Independence Day, allows customers in Delhi to access high-speed data and voice services using BSNL SIMs on compatible devices. Additionally, BSNL has announced the nationwide deployment of its network-side anti-spam and anti-smishing system.
title: BSNL 4G Services Rolled Out in Delhi; Anti-Spam and Smishing Protection Expands to All Users

description: Redmi Note 15 Pro series will debut in China laster this week. The more powerful model, the Redmi Note 15 Pro+, is said to deliver a flagship-like experience with upgrades to display, battery, and connectivity. It may be the first Redmi phone to support Beidou’s satellite messaging and is expected to feature a 1.5K quad-curved display and a 7,000mAh battery. It will offer IP69K durability and a triple-camera setup featuring a 50-megapixel OIS-backed sensor.
title: Redmi Note 15 Pro+ Launch Date Announced; Company Reveals Design, Key Features

description: Samsung Galaxy A17 5G could launch in India soon, as a tipster has revealed the alleged India pricing of the handset. After launching in Europe earlier this month, the South Korean tech giant could offer the handset in three storage configurations. The European variant of the phone is offered in three colour options - black, blue, and grey.
title: Samsung Galaxy A17 5G Price in India Leaked, Could Launch Soon

description: Samsung is expected to refresh its next-generation Galaxy S lineup for 2026 with a new model, ubiquitously known as Galaxy S26 Pro, which might replace the Galaxy S26 Plus. Although the launch isn’t likely to take place until early next year, leaks us now have given us an idea of what to expect. As per a tipster, the purported Samsung Galaxy S26 Pro will be a small-screen handset, with a display real-estate closer to the standard Galaxy S25 than the existing Plus model.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Pro Tipped to Come With a 6.27-inch Screen and 4,300mAh Battery

description: Samsung is planning to expand the manufacturing of its device portfolio in India, the Union Electronics and IT Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw said on Saturday. As per the Union Minister, the South Korean tech giant considers India a strong manufacturing hub, and now plans to better serve its customer base with locally manufactured devices and even export them to other countries.
title: Samsung to Expand Manufacturing of Advanced Tech Devices in India, Says Ashwini Vaishnaw

description: Xiaomi 16 series is expected to launch in September, and Xiaomi President Lu Weibing has revealed that the next generation in the company's flagship series will see significant changes in both its overall identity and market positioning. While he didn’t name the series directly, his remarks are widely expected to refer to the upcoming Xiaomi 16 lineup
title: Xiaomi 16 Series to Launch in China With 'Significant Changes' to Product Positioning

description: Apple could be working on its next-generation smartwatch, which might come with a major redesign and additional onboard sensors. Moreover, the underside of the Apple Watch models, said to launch in 2026, could get a larger glass cover to house bigger sensors arranged in a ring pattern. However, the Cupertino tech giant is yet to confirm the launch.
title: Apple Watch With New Sensors, Major Redesign to Launch in 2026: Report

description: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 will release on November 14 across PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, and Xbox Series S/X, according to a recent leak. The game will skip Nintendo Switch 2 at launch. Black Ops 7 is set to get a reveal at Gamescom Opening Night Live on August 19.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Will Reportedly Release on November 14, Skip Nintendo Switch 2 at Launch

description: Google has rolled out Chrome 139 for Android with several updates. The three-dot menu now includes an “Add tab to group” option, and the Tab Grid switcher gains a “New tab group” button. A bug fix makes the “Copy link” action in the address bar fully functional, accessible by long-pressing the Omnibox. Dynamic Colour for the dark theme has also been refined, moving from darker tones in Chrome 136 to a lighter, grey-like appearance across the entire browser interface.
title: Google Chrome for Android Updated With Improved Tab Groups, Fix for ‘Copy Link’ Shortcut Bug

description: Google introduced Flight Deals last week as a new artificial intelligence (AI) tool that can help travellers find the cheapest flight tickets. The Mountain View-based tech giant says that the new product, which is currently available in beta, is designed for flexible travellers who do not mind changing their dates, destination, and flight type.
title: Google Introduces Flight Deals, an AI-Powered Search Tool That Can Help Users Find Cheapest Flights

description: Lava Play Ultra 5G is all set to be launched in India soon as the company’s first gaming-centric budget smartphone. While specifications remain under wraps, the launch date of the upcoming handset has been confirmed by the brand and it will take place this week. The moniker suggests that it will support 5G capability, while teaser images also hint towards the inclusion of a 64-megapixel “AI Matrix” camera at the back.
title: Lava Play Ultra 5G India Launch Set for August 20; Teased to Go on Sale via Amazon

description: Oppo launched the K13 Turbo in India on August 11, alongside the K13 Turbo Pro. The Pro model went on sale on August 15, while the standard K13 Turbo will be available starting August 18. The smartphone is priced at Rs. 27,999 for the 8GB + 128GB variant and Rs. 29,999 for the 8GB + 256GB configuration. On the first day of the sale, customers can claim an instant discount of Rs. 3,000 using select bank cards.
title: Oppo K13 Turbo With MediaTek Dimensity 8450 SoC Goes on Sale in India: Price, Offers

description: YouTube Music is reportedly testing a new Daily Discover feature that curates fresh music recommendations based on your listening habits. Spotted by a Reddit user, this feed appears on the homepage and offers a selection of new tracks daily. Each recommendation is displayed with a brief note explaining why it was picked.
title: YouTube Music Tests Daily Discover Feature With Personalised Music Recommendations

description: The iPhone 17 series is expected to be launched next month. Ahead of its anticipated debut, a new leak has shed light on the frame design and internal components of the iPhone 17 Pro Max. As per a tipster, the purported handset may transition back from titanium to aluminium for the chassis, resulting in a potentially lighter build. The leaked frame also indicates a shift in the substrate design and inclusion of a larger battery compared to the current model.
title: iPhone 17 Pro Max Leaked Frame Reportedly Hints Towards Lighter Build, Larger Battery

description: The Oppo F31 series is said to be in development as the successor to the Oppo F29 series, which debuted in March. As per a tipster, the lineup will be launched next month, comprising two models — Oppo F31 and Oppo F31 Pro. Both of the handsets are tipped to be equipped with 7,000mAh batteries. Further, the Oppo F31 series may carry the same damage-proof 360-degree Armour Body as its predecessor.
title: Oppo F31 Series Tipped to Launch in September With 7,000mAh Battery, 360-Degree Armour Body

description: The Redmi 15 5G is scheduled to launch in India on August 19, 2025. The company has revealed multiple details of the upcoming smartphone. The handset is confirmed to feature a massive 7,000mAh battery and is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 processor. Here’s everything you need to know about the Redmi 15 launch date, expected price in India, features, specifications, and more.
title: Redmi 15 5G: Launch Date, Expected Price in India, Specifications, Features and More
